long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CYBERhythm is a security platform that protects your cloud assets across multiple cloud servers. Presently, this extension only supports Microsoft Azure and Amazon Web Services onboarding. However, support of other cloud platforms is currently under development and will be released soon!

With CYBERhythm, you can monitor the security status of all your business data at a glance. Your cloud assets are consolidated and displayed within a clean dashboard, allowing for easy tracking and navigability. Respond quickly to potential threats thanks to real time threat alerts that are trigged whenever suspicious activities are detected. All this coupled with our easy onboarding function makes protecting your data effective and convenient.

This extension will allow you to install CYBERhythm into your browser. After installation, you can proceed to connect your cloud data to the platform and start securing your assets! 

Learn more on https://cyberhythm.cloud/
Feedback and Support: contact@cyberhythm.cloud
